mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , sd.store_detail_price , sd.store_detail_quantity , sd.is_discount , sd.store_detail_status FROM store_detail sd JOIN product p ON p.product_id = sd.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN store_user su ON sd.store_id = su.store_id WHERE su.user_id = #{manageId}

SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , sd.store_detail_price , sd.store_detail_quantity , sd.is_discount FROM store_detail sd JOIN product p ON p.product_id = sd.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN store s ON s.store_id = sd.store_id WHERE s.user_id = #{manageId} AND p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')

SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , sd.store_detail_price , sd.store_detail_quantity , sd.is_discount FROM store_detail sd JOIN product p ON p.product_id = sd.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN store s ON s.store_id = sd.store_id WHERE s.user_id = #{manageId} AND c.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCategory}, '%')

SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , sd.store_detail_price , sd.store_detail_quantity , sd.is_discount FROM store_detail sd JOIN product p ON p.product_id = sd.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN store s ON s.store_id = sd.store_id WHERE s.user_id = #{manageId} AND sd.store_detail_quantity <= 10
